description: Geyser is a bridge between Minecraft: Bedrock Edition and Minecraft: Java Edition, closing the gap from those wanting to play true cross-platform.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# GeyserMC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
GEYSER_HASH=`curl -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest | jq -r .downloads.standalone.sha256`
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/standalone
echo "${GEYSER_HASH} ${SERVER_JARFILE}" | sha256sum -c
RESULT=$?
if [[ $RESULT -eq 0 ]]; then
echo "Geyser SHA256 match"
else
echo "SHA256 does not match! Aborting..."
rm ${SERVER_JARFILE}
exit 1
fi
curl -o config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GeyserMC/Geyser/master/core/src/main/resources/config.yml
